text: <@U3T21PDBK> did you ever figure this out?

<@U04CVFKRCTV> You could do what Jacob said. but you'd have to have a repeater for the global module, so all the fields will be in a group that repeats and you could have a text field to choose what domain those fields get displayed on.
thats the only way I can think of. otherwise you'd have to have a version of that module in each theme
Will have a look into that approach and give it a test. Appreciate the help
